item.title: On the nightmare of software versioning
item.description: If you’ll indulge me, a metaphor… Software versioning always seems to be one of the hard problems of software engineering, and my reasoning can be explained by the following metaphor. Think of a large software project you’ve been familiar with. Now think about some of the details of that software; e.g. some of the complicated parts of the code, some of the known issues and bugs; some of the concurrency that might be involved; some of those places in the code that are best left untouched.
